Professional, Creative Solutions with Nicole Cahoon

Nicole Cahoon, CPA offers a full range of accounting and bookkeeping services to small and mid-sized businesses in Courtenay, Comox, Cumberland and all neighbouring towns in the Comox Valley.

Get in Touch

Meet Nicole Cahoon

At Nicole Cahoon, CPA we are committed to provide a variety of services to meet the needs of our clients by fostering an environment that encourages personal and professional growth. We are dedicated to provide excellent customer service by focusing on the three underlying principles of professionalism, responsiveness and quality. We specialize in small to medium size businesses in the Comox Valley and surrounding areas.

Accounting Services

Corporate Year Ends - Financial Statements Preparation

We can prepare your financial statements in accordance with professional standards, but express no opinion or any other form of assurance on the underlying information included in them. The financial statements produced are a useful tool for making financial decisions.

Cash Flow Analysis

We can evaluate your company's financial position, estimate financing requirements, and track cash-flow sources.

Bookkeeping Services

We can organize your financial records to ensure that your small or midsized business operates efficiently, which is the basis of successful business.

For more information, or to book an appointment call our office today!
